here is brief overview of project:

  - app/native: react-native app [nativewind]
  - app/server: hono server app []
  - app/web: nextjs app []
- I am using oRPC for End-to-End Type Safety api
- MongoDB as database with mongoose as ORM
- We are using Better Auth for authentication
